steps: step 3: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'display list of items:/{fixed part}/{item main or descendent item category id or slug}'
step 10: Click on span navigationLinks (PageLink) -> Navigate to page 'display list of items:/{fixed page}'
step 12: Enter email and proceed through shipping form
step 13: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'display single item:/{fixed page}/{item id or slug}'
step 14: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
